summary: All five requirements are fully implemented. REQ-1 and REQ-2 address Canvas dithering placement (removing incorrect onCreated hook code and adding dithering to gl prop). REQ-3 adjusts envMap intensity for 5 main biomes to 1.5 while preserving VOLCANIC_CRAG at 1.3. REQ-4 sets emissive intensity to 3.2 with the specified pulse logic. REQ-5 updates Bloom parameters to the exact values requested. No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.
